    • Method Detail

      • acceptConnection

        public SirqulResponse acceptConnection(Long accountId,
                              Long friendAccountId,
                              String appKey,
                              Boolean notifyFriend,
                              String notificationMessage)
                                throws SirqulException
        Accept a friend request and optionally sends a notification.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/friend/accept
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        friendAccountId - the friend's account id
        appKey - the application key. A unique id of the app. Maps to "gameType".
        notifyFriend - determines whether to send a notification to the afflicting party
        notificationMessage - optional message to send in a notification
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • addConnectionToGroup

        public SirqulResponse addConnectionToGroup(Long accountId,
                                  Long connectionId,
                                  Long connectionAccountId,
                                  Long pendingId,
                                  Long groupId,
                                  Location location)
                                    throws SirqulException
        Adds a connection to a group.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/connection/group/addConnection
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId added automatically)
        connectionId - the connection id
        connectionAccountId - the connection account id
        pendingId - the pending id
        groupId - the group id
        location - the current location of the user
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • addOrUpdateConnection

        public SirqulResponse addOrUpdateConnection(Long accountId,
                                   Long connectionId,
                                   Long connectionAccountId,
                                   Long pendingId,
                                   Long groupId,
                                   String appKey,
                                   Boolean isTrusted,
                                   Boolean isBlocked,
                                   Boolean isFollowing)
                                     throws SirqulException
        Creates or updates the connection of the user and another account. Allows a user to follow, block, mark as trusted, and/or add someone to a group.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/connection/add
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically).
        connectionId - the connection id for editing
        connectionAccountId - the connection account id (i.e. the account id of another user)
        pendingId - the pending id (usually for people who do not have a Sirqul account but are already friends via other third party apps)
        groupId - optional group id if the user wants to add this person into a group
        appKey - the application key. Maps to "gameType".
        isTrusted - determines whether the user is trusting this account
        isBlocked - determines whether the user is blocking this account
        isFollowing - determines whether the user is following this account
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • addOrUpdateGroup

        public ConnectionGroupResponse addOrUpdateGroup(Long accountId,
                                       String name,
                                       Long groupId,
                                       Long assetId,
                                       List<String> connections,
                                       String description,
                                       Boolean canViewProfileInfo,
                                       Boolean canViewGameInfo,
                                       Boolean canViewFriendInfo,
                                       Location location)
                                         throws SirqulException
        Creates a new private group.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/connection/group
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        name - the name of the group
        groupId - the group id to update a group (don't pass anything in if you want to create a new group)
        assetId - the asset to attach to the group
        connections - list of connection IDs
        description - the description of the group
        canViewProfileInfo - determines whether the connections in the group can see the user's profile info
        canViewGameInfo - determines whether the connections in the group can see the user's game info
        canViewFriendInfo - determines whether the connections in the group can see the user's friends/connections
        location - the location
        Returns:
        a ConnectionGroupResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • addSubGroups

        public ConnectionGroupResponse addSubGroups(Long accountId,
                                   Long groupId,
                                   List<Long> subGroupIds,
                                   Location location)
                                     throws SirqulException
        Add sub groups to a group.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/connection/group/addSubGroup
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId added automatically)
        groupId - the parent group id
        subGroupIds - list of group IDs to add to the parent group
        location - the current location of the user
        Returns:
        ConnectionGroupResponse on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getConnections

        public ConnectionListResponse getConnections(Long accountId,
                                    Long connectionAccountId,
                                    List<Enums.ConnectionApiMap> filters,
                                    String keyword,
                                    Enums.ConnectionApiMap sortField,
                                    Boolean descending,
                                    Integer start,
                                    Integer limit,
                                    Location location)
                                      throws SirqulException
        Gets the connections.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/connection/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id (deviceId or accountId required)
        connectionAccountId - optional parameter to search on other account's connections
        filters - a comma separated list of Enums.ConnectionApiMap. (NOTE on FOLLOWER vs FOLLOWING: FOLLOWER will get me a list of followers, FOLLOWING will get me a list of people I am following)
        keyword - an optional keyword to search on, this parameter is ignored if empty
        sortField - sorts the response list by Enums.ConnectionApiMap
        descending - determines whether the sorted list is in descending or ascending order
        start - start index of the pagination
        limit - limit of the pagination
        location - the current location of the user.
        Returns:
        a ConnectionListResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getConnectionsRequested

        public ConnectionListResponse getConnectionsRequested(Long accountId)
                                               throws SirqulException
        Gets the connections requested.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/connection/getRequested
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id
        Returns:
        a ConnectionListResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getGroupDetails

        public ConnectionGroupResponse getGroupDetails(Long accountId,
                                      Long groupId,
                                      Boolean combineConnections,
                                      Location location)
                                        throws SirqulException
        Get detailed information about a group.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/connection/group/details/get
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId added automatically)
        groupId - the group id
        combineConnections - the combine connections
        location - the current location of the user
        Returns:
        ConnectionGroupResponse on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • getGroups

        public ConnectionInfoResponse getGroups(String connectionAccountEmail,
                               Long connectionAccountId,
                               List<Enums.ProfileFilters> responseFilters,
                               Location location)
                                 throws SirqulException
        Gets a user's private groups and default groups.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/connection/group/get
        Parameters:
        connectionAccountEmail - the connection account email
        connectionAccountId - the connection account id
        responseFilters - a comma separated list of Enums.ProfileFilters for filtering the returned response data
        location - the current location of the user
        Returns:
        a ConnectionInfoResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • rejectConnection

        public SirqulResponse rejectConnection(Long accountId,
                              Long friendAccountId,
                              String appKey,
                              Boolean notifyFriend,
                              String notificationMessage)
                                throws SirqulException
        Reject a friend request and optionally sends a notification.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/friend/reject
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        friendAccountId - the friend's account id
        appKey - the application key. A unique id of the app. Maps to "gameType".
        notifyFriend - determines whether to send a notification to the afflicting party
        notificationMessage - optional message to send in a notification
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • removeConnection

        public SirqulResponse removeConnection(Long accountId,
                              Long friendAccountId,
                              Boolean notifyFriend,
                              Boolean removeFromGroups)
                                throws SirqulException
        Removes a friend from the user's friends list.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/friend/remove
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        friendAccountId - the account ID of the friend to remove
        notifyFriend - optionally notifies the connection that they have been removed as a friend
        removeFromGroups - optionally removes the connection from the user's groups
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

                                         throws SirqulException

      • removeGroup

        public SirqulResponse removeGroup(Long accountId,
                         Long groupId,
                         Location location)
                           throws SirqulException
        Remove a user's group.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/connection/group/remove
        Parameters:

        groupId - the group id

        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail

      • removeSubGroups

        public ConnectionGroupResponse removeSubGroups(Long accountId,
                                      Long groupId,
                                      List<Long> subGroupIds,
                                      Location location)
                                        throws SirqulException
        Remove sub groups from a group

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/connection/group/removeSubGroup.
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId added automatically)
        groupId - the parent group id
        subGroupIds - list of group IDs to remove from the parent group
        location - the current location of the user
        Returns:
        ConnectionGroupResponse on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • requestConnection

        public SirqulResponse requestConnection(Long accountId,
                               Long friendAccountId,
                               String appKey,
                               String notificationMessage)
                                 throws SirqulException
        Sends a friend request to another user and optionally sends a notification.

        Target API Endpoint: /consumer/friend/request
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required)
        friendAccountId - the friend's account id
        appKey - the application key. A unique id of the app. Maps to "gameType".
        notificationMessage - optional message to send in a notification
        Returns:
        a SirqulResponse with a message of success or fail
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchConnectionsByName

        public ConnectionListResponse searchConnectionsByName(Long accountId,
                                             String keyword,
                                             Location location,
                                             String appKey,
                                             Integer start,
                                             Integer limit)
                                               throws SirqulException
        Search for accounts that the user may not have a connection with.

        Target API Endpoint: /connection/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - the account id
        keyword - an optional keyword to search on, this parameter is ignored if empty
        location - the current location of the user
        appKey - the application key. Maps to "gameType".
        start - the start index for pagination
        limit - the limit for pagination
        Returns:
        a ConnectionListResponse on valid response, or SirqulResponse with error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
